Player History
Drafted in 4th round, 51st overall pick, by San Francisco in 2015...
Had first career hit (double) on 4/1/2015, off Takamasa Tokuhei (MON)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/1/2015, off Steven Riffe (MON)...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/10/2015, hitting .429 with 6 HR, 10 RBI...
Injured on 4/29/2015 with a Broken Hand, out for 6 weeks...
Drove in 6 runs against Cincinnati on 7/22/2015...
Signed as a free agent by Cincinnati on 2/9/2016 to a 3-year deal worth $10,000,000 per year...
Was selected to the 2016 Allstar game...
Drove in 6 runs against San Francisco on 8/4/2016...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/25/2016, hitting .389 with 3 HR, 7 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/17/2017, hitting .435 with 4 HR, 10 RBI...
